title: To my own MINIATURE PICTURE taken at two years of age
description:
LibriVox volunteers bring you 11 recordings of To My Own Miniature Picture taken at two years of age by Robert Southey.
This was the Fortnightly Poetry project for February 11, 2024.
------
Robert Southey was an English poet of the Romantic school, and Poet Laureate from 1813 until his death. Like the other Lake Poets, William Wordsworth and Samuel Taylor Coleridge, Southey began as a radical but became steadily more conservative as he gained respect for Britain and its institutions.He is remembered especially for the poem "After Blenheim" and the original version of "Goldilocks and the Three Bears". - Summary by Wikipedia
